info.name: ServiceBooking Platform - Complete API Collection
info.description:
Complete sequential API collection for the ServiceBooking platform.

Run order:
1. Auth - Register & Login users
2. Service Catalog - Create categories & sub-services
3. Customer Profile - Manage addresses
4. Provider Management - Setup, approval, availability
5. Bookings - Create, slot booking, accept, complete
6. Payments - Record & confirm
7. Ratings & Reviews
8. Notifications
9. Admin Management
10. Analytics

Variables:
- {{base_url}} = http://localhost:8080
- {{customer_token}} = JWT after customer login
- {{provider_token}} = JWT after provider login
- {{admin_token}} = JWT after admin login

item.name: 01 - Authentication
item.description: User registration, OTP verification, password setup, and login

request.description: Register a new customer. An OTP will be sent to the email.
Register a new service provider. An OTP will be sent to the email.
Register an admin user. An OTP will be sent to the email.
Resend OTP to a registered email address.
Verify the OTP received via email. Replace '123456' with the actual OTP. Account status changes to ACTIVE.
Verify provider OTP. Replace '123456' with actual OTP.
Verify admin OTP. Replace '123456' with actual OTP.
Set password for the customer account after OTP verification.
Set password for the provider account after OTP verification.
Set password for the admin account after OTP verification.
Login as customer. Token is auto-saved to {{customer_token}} variable.
Login as provider. Token is auto-saved to {{provider_token}} variable.
Login as admin. Token is auto-saved to {{admin_token}} variable.
Get the currently logged-in customer's profile. Auto-saves customer_id.
Get the currently logged-in provider's profile. Auto-saves provider_id.
Update the current user's name.
Admin-only: Get any user's profile by ID.

item.name: 03 - Service Catalog
item.description: Manage service categories and sub-services (Admin creates, public can view)

request.description: Admin creates a new service category.
Admin creates another service category.
Public: List all service categories. Auto-saves first category_id.
Admin updates an existing service category.
Admin adds a sub-service under a category.
Admin adds another sub-service under the same category.
Public: List all sub-services in a category. Auto-saves first sub_service_id.
Admin updates an existing sub-service.
Public: Search sub-services by name or description keyword.

item.name: 04 - Customer Profile & Addresses
item.description: Manage customer profile and delivery addresses

request.description: Get customer profile with addresses. Auto-creates profile if not exists.
Update customer profile name.
Add a new address for the customer. If isDefault=true, other addresses are unset as default.
Add a second address.
Get profile again to see addresses and capture address_id.
Update an existing address.

item.name: 05 - Provider Management
item.description: Provider setup, document upload, approval, availability, and job management

request.description: Provider initial setup: link to sub-services they can perform. Creates ProviderProfile (not approved).
Upload verification document (AADHAR, PAN, or LICENSE). Notifies all admins.
Upload PAN card document.
Admin approves a provider's profile. Provider can now go online and accept jobs.
Toggle provider online status. Must be approved first.
Create hourly availability slots for a specific date (e.g., 09:00-17:00 creates 8 one-hour slots).
View available PENDING jobs. Provider must be approved and online.
Accept a pending job. Booking status: PENDING -> ACCEPTED.
Mark a job as completed. Booking status: ACCEPTED -> COMPLETED.
Get total earnings from completed bookings.
Toggle provider offline.

item.name: 06 - Bookings
item.description: Create bookings, view slots, book slots, view history

request.description: Customer creates a new booking. Status starts as PENDING. Price is captured from sub-service base price.
Get all bookings for the logged-in customer. Auto-saves booking_id.
Get available time slots for a specific service on a given date.
Book a specific slot with a provider. providerId is optional (auto-assigned if not provided). Slot is locked atomically.
Get all bookings assigned to the logged-in provider.
Get booking history sorted by creation date (newest first).
Cancel a booking. Customer or provider who owns the booking can cancel.

item.name: 07 - Payments
item.description: Record and manage cash payments with 20% platform commission

request.description: Provider records cash payment for a booking. Status: RECORDED. One payment per booking.
Confirm payment as PAID. Only after booking is COMPLETED. Commission (20%) is calculated.
Admin views paginated payment history with commission breakdown.

item.name: 08 - Ratings & Reviews
item.description: Submit ratings (1-5 stars) and text reviews for completed bookings

request.description: Customer submits a star rating (1-5) for a COMPLETED booking. One rating per booking.
Customer submits a text review for a COMPLETED booking. Can be combined with or separate from rating.
Public: View paginated ratings and reviews for a specific provider.
Get average rating and total review count for a provider.
Public: View paginated reviews for a specific sub-service.
Get paginated notifications for the logged-in user. Auto-saves first notification_id.
Get paginated notifications for the provider.
Mark a specific notification as read.

item.name: 10 - Admin Management
item.description: Admin dashboard, user management, reports, and provider approvals

request.description: Admin dashboard with key metrics: total users, customers, providers, bookings, revenue, commission.
Admin views paginated list of all customers.
Admin suspends a user account. Status: ACTIVE -> SUSPENDED.
Admin unsuspends a user account. Status: SUSPENDED -> ACTIVE.
Admin approves/rejects provider via admin endpoint.
Admin updates the base price of a sub-service.
Admin views paginated list of all bookings in the system.
Admin manually assigns a provider to a PENDING booking. Status: PENDING -> ACCEPTED.
Admin gets booking report for a date range: total, completed, cancelled counts.
Admin views provider performance: completed jobs, revenue, commission, net earnings.
Admin rejects a provider with a reason. Provider receives notification.

item.name: 11 - Analytics
item.description: Analytics and reporting endpoints for admin

request.description: Admin views monthly booking statistics: total, completed, cancelled for a given month.
Admin views overall revenue summary: gross revenue, platform commission (20%), provider net.
Admin views provider activity: completed bookings count per provider.
Admin views customer usage trends: total bookings per customer.
Delete a customer address by ID.
Admin deletes a service category.
Admin deletes a sub-service.
Soft-delete current user account. Status changes to DELETED.
